one cold holiday, my daughter wanted to eat hot humberger and french fries, however we cannot get them. at this Urban Grill, the master â€¦

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Really nice staff, good beers and great fries. Didnâ€™t eat anything else, but the burgers looked really delicious

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text:
Nice little Grill with best singing waiter. French fries were ok but expensive.
Large french fries more than 5 â‚¬ and Bitterballen also 5â‚¬.

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Just ordered fries. Not bad, but portion not top big. Waiter friendly. Tasted excellent.

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: If you're into Gourmet Burgers, then this is the place. The staff were a little short and weren't all that willing to explain how ordering worked, as it was quite difficult when you're expecting to order a burger! Saying that, it was well â€¦

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: If you're looking for a proper fresh and tasty burger... urban grill it!

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Amazing tasting burgers. My friends got Irish Beef and Chicken and I got a vegetarian with fried aubergine. Very good price and staff are super friendly. Would definitely come back when in Amsterdam again!

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: The veggie Burger was pretty tasteless, oily and too expensive. Very small place to eat aswell. 16 euro for hamburger with onion and jalapenios with small fries and a soda. Should've gone to McDonalds.

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: We were their first customers. Ever. So this place is special for the two of us, but its one of those sorta affordable chips joints here in Amsterdam. And if you know how good they can taste after some green, you'll know why we loved it here.

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Perfect classic burger and fries, no waiting good value

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Absolutely waste of money. I got irish beef burger and the beef was not even fully cooked. They don't even cook the meat manually but with an automatic machine, maybe that's why. Apart from the uncooked meat, they put at most two spoons of â€¦

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Amazing burger, it is actually the best burger I ever ate in my life !!! Plus, the chef was really nice. Super !

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Burgers (meat) are small, with cheap cheese and extras (mushrooms) forgotten. Fries also small. Prices way to high for what you get. With so many good burger bars around, not worth a visit !

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Good food but the service was really bad. The were two guys, an old and a younger, and the youngest one was the worst, super rude and disrespectful. He was swearing at us in his language (of course we could realise he was talking about us) â€¦

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Ordered food @ Urban Grill with the whole company (20 people). Unfortunately the burgers we're cold once they arrived here. Furthermore they where not labeled and it looked like they had just made everything in a hurry. Worst company lunch we have ordered so far, would definitely not come back here.

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: I really don't recommend this shop. It was crowded, service was bad and even the food was bad. The fries where way to hard an there was no salt on them. We also had to wait 45minutes for 3 large fries! â€¦

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Burger far away from my expectations. Service not very friendly. I don't recommend. Easy to find a better burger (e.g. the butcher's)

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Great burger and fries!  Loved this place...very reasonably priced as well.  It is very small but & can get crowded but it worth the wait!

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Horrible place. The man that served us was extremely rude. Save your money and go somewhere else. This place knows nothing about customer service. You pay for frozen food. You're better off going elsewhere. Bad end to our trip to Amsterdam.

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Just another Burgershop. The fries were okay but large size and small size is the same for different price. I would not recommend it.

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Amazing burgers. Would recommend the sweet potatoes fries. Kinda small place, would recommend take-away

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Good chips and good burger, tad pricey but standard for the location. Friendly staff too.

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Amazing burgers. very tasty for a reasonable price.location is great

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Very good service, taste and price for a quick burger or snack, highly recommended

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Just another hamburger place. Amsterdam has too many of these. Burgers were soggy, fries ok. Nithing special.

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Nice service, but I didn't enjoy the burger.

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: The quality of the burger didn't match the high price I had to pay for it.

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Delicious food, thank you Marco for the experience and great service

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Had 2 burgers and some drinks. I felt a bit ripped off since this is a bit of a tourist trap.

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Very Nice burgers! Amazing hospitality

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Bit expensive but I guess this is what you get at Dam Square. Burgers are okay.

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Not enter this place. The owner is unpleasant. Nice City, bad place.

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Very fast. Very tasty. Very very very goood!

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Staff are not friendly to tourist

Name: Urban Grill
Review Text: Cheap but service is bad

Name: Urban Grill
